88 template<class IntegralType>
89 class StringToIntegralValidatorXMLConverter :
90  public ValidatorXMLConverter

100  const XMLObject& xmlObj,
101  const IDtoValidatorMap& validatorIDsMap) const;

109  #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_DEBUG

112  getDummyValidator() const{

116  #endif

126  static const std::string& getIntegralValueAttributeName() {
127  static const std::string integralValueAttributeName_ = "integralValue";
128  return integralValueAttributeName_;
129  }
130 
132  static const std::string& getStringTagName() {
133  static const std::string stringTagName_ = "String";
134  return stringTagName_;
135  }
136 
138  static const std::string& getStringValueAttributeName() {
139  static const std::string stringValueAttributeName_ = "stringValue";

145  static const std::string stringDocAttributeName_ = "stringDoc";
146  return stringDocAttributeName_;
147  }

165 
166 template<class IntegralType>
167 RCP<ParameterEntryValidator>
168 StringToIntegralValidatorXMLConverter<IntegralType>::convertXML(
169  const XMLObject& xmlObj,
170  const IDtoValidatorMap& /*validatorIDsMap*/) const
171 {
172  Array<std::string> strings;
173  Array<std::string> stringDocs;
174  Array<IntegralType> integralValues;
175  for (int i=0; i<xmlObj.numChildren(); ++i) {
176  XMLObject currentChild = xmlObj.getChild(i);
177  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(currentChild.getTag() != getStringTagName(),
178  BadTagException,
179  "Error converting xmlObject to "
180  "StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator." << std::endl <<
181  "Unrecognized tag: " << currentChild.getTag());
182  strings.append(currentChild.getRequired(getStringValueAttributeName()));
183  if (currentChild.hasAttribute(getIntegralValueAttributeName())) {
184  integralValues.append(
185  currentChild.getRequired<IntegralType>(
186  getIntegralValueAttributeName()));
187  }
188  if (currentChild.hasAttribute(getStringDocAttributeName())) {
189  stringDocs.append(
190  currentChild.getRequired<std::string>(getStringDocAttributeName()));
191  }
192  }
193  std::string defaultParameterName =
194  xmlObj.getRequired(getDefaultParameterAttributeName());
195 
196  if(stringDocs.size() != 0 && integralValues.size() != 0){
197  return stringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>(
198  strings, stringDocs, integralValues(), defaultParameterName);
199  }
200  else if(integralValues.size() != 0){
201  return stringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>(
202  strings, integralValues(), defaultParameterName);
203  }
204  else{
205  return stringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType>(
206  strings, defaultParameterName);
207  }
208 }
209 
210 
211 template<class IntegralType>
212 void StringToIntegralValidatorXMLConverter<IntegralType>::convertValidator(
213  const RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> validator,
214  XMLObject& xmlObj,
215  const ValidatortoIDMap& /*validatorIDsMap*/) const
216 {
217  RCP<const StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType> >
218  castedValidator =
219  rcp_dynamic_cast<
220  const StringToIntegralParameterEntryValidator<IntegralType> >(
221  validator, true);
222 
223  RCP<const Array<std::string> > stringValues =
224  castedValidator->validStringValues();
225  RCP<const Array<std::string> > stringDocValues =
226  castedValidator->getStringDocs();
227 
228  bool hasStringDocs =
229  !(stringDocValues.is_null()) && (stringDocValues->size() != 0);
230  for (int i =0; i<stringValues->size(); ++i) {
231  XMLObject stringTag(getStringTagName());
232  stringTag.addAttribute(getStringValueAttributeName(), (*stringValues)[i]);
233  stringTag.addAttribute(getIntegralValueAttributeName(),
234  castedValidator->getIntegralValue((*stringValues)[i]));
235  if (hasStringDocs) {
236  stringTag.addAttribute(
237  getStringDocAttributeName(), (*stringDocValues)[i]);
238  }
239  xmlObj.addChild(stringTag);
240  }
241  xmlObj.addAttribute(getDefaultParameterAttributeName(),
242  castedValidator->getDefaultParameterName());
243  xmlObj.addAttribute(getIntegralValueAttributeName(),
244  TypeNameTraits<IntegralType>::name());
245 }

334 template<class T>
335 class EnhancedNumberValidatorXMLConverter : public ValidatorXMLConverter
336 {
337 
338 public:
339

344  RCP<ParameterEntryValidator> convertXML(
345  const XMLObject& xmlObj,
346  const IDtoValidatorMap& validatorIDsMap) const;

364

369  static const std::string& getMinAttributeName() {
370  static const std::string minAttributeName = "min";
371  return minAttributeName;
372  }
373 
375  static const std::string& getMaxAttributeName() {
376  static const std::string maxAttributeName = "max";
377  return maxAttributeName;
378  }
379 
381  static const std::string& getStepAttributeName() {
382  static const std::string stepAttributeName = "step";
383  return stepAttributeName;
384  }

388  static const std::string precisionAttributeName = "precision";
389  return precisionAttributeName;

396 
397 template<class T>
398 RCP<ParameterEntryValidator>
399 EnhancedNumberValidatorXMLConverter<T>::convertXML(
400  const XMLObject& xmlObj,
401  const IDtoValidatorMap& /*validatorIDsMap*/) const
402 {
403  RCP<EnhancedNumberValidator<T> > toReturn =
404  rcp(new EnhancedNumberValidator<T>);
405  T step = xmlObj.getWithDefault(
406  getStepAttributeName(), EnhancedNumberTraits<T>::defaultStep());
407  toReturn->setStep(step);
408  unsigned short int precision = xmlObj.getWithDefault(
409  getPrecisionAttributeName(),
410  EnhancedNumberTraits<T>::defaultPrecision());
411  toReturn->setPrecision(precision);
412  if (xmlObj.hasAttribute(getMinAttributeName())) {
413  toReturn->setMin(xmlObj.getRequired<T>(getMinAttributeName()));
414  }
415  if (xmlObj.hasAttribute(getMaxAttributeName())) {
416  toReturn->setMax(xmlObj.getRequired<T>(getMaxAttributeName()));
417  }
418  return toReturn;
419 }
420 
421 
422 template<class T>
423 void EnhancedNumberValidatorXMLConverter<T>::convertValidator(
424  const RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator > validator,
425  XMLObject& xmlObj,
426  const ValidatortoIDMap& /*validatorIDsMap*/) const
427 {
428  RCP<const EnhancedNumberValidator<T> > castedValidator =
429  rcp_dynamic_cast<const EnhancedNumberValidator<T> >(validator, true);
430  if (castedValidator->hasMin()) {
431  xmlObj.addAttribute<T>(getMinAttributeName(), castedValidator->getMin());
432  }
433  if (castedValidator->hasMax()) {
434  xmlObj.addAttribute<T>(getMaxAttributeName(), castedValidator->getMax());
435  }
436  xmlObj.addAttribute<T>(getStepAttributeName(), castedValidator->getStep());
437  xmlObj.addAttribute<short unsigned int>(
438  getPrecisionAttributeName(), castedValidator->getPrecision());
439 }

559 template<class ValidatorType, class EntryType>
560 class AbstractArrayValidatorXMLConverter : public ValidatorXMLConverter{
561 public:
562 
565 
567  RCP<ParameterEntryValidator> convertXML(
568  const XMLObject& xmlObj,
569  const IDtoValidatorMap& validatorIDsMap) const;
570 
572  void convertValidator(
573  const RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> validator,
574  XMLObject& xmlObj,
575  const ValidatortoIDMap& validatorIDsMap) const;
576 
578 
581 
585  virtual RCP<AbstractArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType> >
586  getConcreteValidator(RCP<ValidatorType> prototypeValidator) const = 0;
587 
589 };
590 
591 
592 template<class ValidatorType, class EntryType>
593 RCP<ParameterEntryValidator>
594 AbstractArrayValidatorXMLConverter<ValidatorType, EntryType>::convertXML(
595  const XMLObject& xmlObj,
596  const IDtoValidatorMap& validatorIDsMap) const
597 {
598  RCP<ValidatorType> prototypeValidator;
599  if(xmlObj.hasAttribute(
600  ValidatorXMLConverter::getPrototypeIdAttributeName()))
601  {
602  IDtoValidatorMap::const_iterator result =
603  validatorIDsMap.find(
604  xmlObj.getRequired<ParameterEntryValidator::ValidatorID>(
605  getPrototypeIdAttributeName()));
606  if (result != validatorIDsMap.end() ) {
607  prototypeValidator =
608  rcp_dynamic_cast<ValidatorType>(result->second, true);
609  }
610  else {
611  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(true,
612  MissingValidatorDefinitionException,
613  "Could not find prototype validator with id: "
614  << xmlObj.getRequired<ParameterEntryValidator::ValidatorID>(
615  getPrototypeIdAttributeName()) << std::endl<< std::endl);
616  }
617  }
618  else {
619  prototypeValidator = rcp_dynamic_cast<ValidatorType>(
620  ValidatorXMLConverterDB::convertXML(
621  xmlObj.getChild(0), validatorIDsMap), true);
622  }
623  return getConcreteValidator(prototypeValidator);
624 }
625 
626 template<class ValidatorType, class EntryType>
627 void
628 AbstractArrayValidatorXMLConverter<ValidatorType, EntryType>::convertValidator(
629  const RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> validator,
630  XMLObject& xmlObj,
631  const ValidatortoIDMap& validatorIDsMap) const
632 {
633  RCP<const AbstractArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType> > castedValidator =
634  rcp_dynamic_cast<const AbstractArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType> >(
635  validator, true);
636  if(validatorIDsMap.find(castedValidator->getPrototype())
637  == validatorIDsMap.end())
638  {
639  xmlObj.addChild(ValidatorXMLConverterDB::convertValidator(
640  castedValidator->getPrototype(), validatorIDsMap, false));
641  }
642  else{
643  ParameterEntryValidator::ValidatorID prototypeID =
644  validatorIDsMap.find(castedValidator->getPrototype())->second;
645 
646  xmlObj.addAttribute<ParameterEntryValidator::ValidatorID>(
647  getPrototypeIdAttributeName(), prototypeID);
648  }
649 }
650 
678 template<class ValidatorType, class EntryType>
679 class ArrayValidatorXMLConverter :
680  public AbstractArrayValidatorXMLConverter<ValidatorType, EntryType>
681 {
684 
685  virtual RCP<AbstractArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType> > getConcreteValidator(
686  RCP<ValidatorType> prototypeValidator) const
687  {
688  return rcp(new ArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType>(prototypeValidator));
689  }
690 
691 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_DEBUG
692 
695  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> getDummyValidator() const{
696  return DummyObjectGetter<ArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType> >::
697  getDummyObject();
698  }
700 #endif
701 };
702 
730 template<class ValidatorType, class EntryType>
731 class TwoDArrayValidatorXMLConverter :
732  public AbstractArrayValidatorXMLConverter<ValidatorType, EntryType>
733 {
736 
737  virtual RCP<AbstractArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType> > getConcreteValidator(
738  RCP<ValidatorType> prototypeValidator) const
739  {
740  return rcp(new TwoDArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType>(prototypeValidator));
741  }
742 
744 
745 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_DEBUG
746 
749  RCP<const ParameterEntryValidator> getDummyValidator() const{
750  return DummyObjectGetter<TwoDArrayValidator<ValidatorType, EntryType> >::
751  getDummyObject();
752  }
754 #endif
755 
756 };
